# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(xc LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(xc "")
set_target_properties(xc PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "xc")
target_include_directories(xc PRIVATE
    include
)
target_include_directories(xc PRIVATE
    C:/Users/ark/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/t/tiny-process-library/v2.0.4/7622b629f67d49038b8976329664c2ee/include
)
target_compile_options(xc PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
target_compile_features(xc PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(xc PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(xc PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET xc PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(xc PRIVATE
    tiny-process-library
)
target_link_directories(xc PRIVATE
    C:/Users/ark/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/t/tiny-process-library/v2.0.4/7622b629f67d49038b8976329664c2ee/lib
)
target_sources(xc PRIVATE
    source/main.cpp
    source/xc/xcmake.cpp
)
